column1: Visiting hours for Jean will be on Sunday from 4 to 7 pm at Colonial Forastiere Funeral Home
column3: Agawam. Her funeral will begin at 8:45am on Monday
column5: followed by a Liturgy of Christian Burial at 10am at Sacred Heart Church
column7: in the Feeding Hills section of Agawam. Rites of Committal will conclude at St. Aloysius Cemetery
column9: in the Indian Orchard section of Springfield.
